Since early outbreaks were described during the Hajj pilgrimages of 2000 and 2001 (
12 ,
13 ), IMD caused by N. meningitidis serogroup W (MenW) has been increasingly responsible for epidemics globally (
1 ,
14 –
16 ). MenW has also emerged as a cause for endemic disease in South Africa, the United Kingdom, and Chile (
17 –
19 ).
